room_title: Escape room "Mirage" by Mission X Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: This was a great first experience. The staff was very helpful and me and my boyfriend loved our first experience. We booked this the same day because we were tired of the same old movie and dinner night. We called to learn more information and Jenna( I believe that's her name and sorry if misspelled) answered all our questions. Will definitely be back !! The room we escaped was the Mirage awesome first choice

room_title: Escape room "Mirage" by Mission X Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: Very good experience! Challenging but not impossible. Was good with the older kids as well. We did the Mirage and would highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Mirage" by Mission X Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: Our group of five had an awesome time in the Mirage room today. Puzzles were very creative and fun. Definitely a challenge. Can't wait to try the other rooms!
